datafield.subfield: Professional files relating to his career with the University Museum and as a professor of zoology, and presidential files containing correspondence, reports, speeches, and other University materials, including budget and legislative files, material relating to changes in University administration, his relationship with faculty, students and alumni, and cases of discipline, freedom of speech and tenure which arose during his years as president; and photographs.
Finding aid available via World Wide Web at URL: http://quod.lib.umich.edu/cgi/f/findaid/findaid-idx?c=bhlead&idno=umich-bhl-86550
B'nai B'rith Hillel Foundation (University of Michigan)
Board in Control of Intercollegiate Athletics.
Dept. of Military Science and Tactics.
National Association for the Advancement of Colored People.
